com.github.codeteapot.jmibeans

Interface PlatformContext


  • public interface PlatformContext
    Access to the context generated by the platform adapter.

    It allows interacting with the available machines.

    See Also:
    PlatformAdapter.getContext()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Stream<Machine> available()
      All available machines on the platform.
      Optional<Machine> lookup(MachineRef ref)
      The machine identified by the specified reference, if available.

    • Method Detail

      • available

        Stream<Machine> available()
        All available machines on the platform.
        Returns:
        The stream of all machines.

      • lookup

        Optional<Machine> lookup(MachineRef ref)
        The machine identified by the specified reference, if available.
        Parameters:
        ref - The reference of the requested machine.
        Returns:
        The machine identified by the given reference, or empty if it is not available.
